Sentencas: There have been a tremendous research affects in recent years for alternative routes of electricity generation using some maximum yield technologies, increased reliability, and minimum pollution.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing

Sentencas: From this point of view, the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are considered as the cleanest technologies for obtaining electrical energy generation.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing

Sentencas: However, an important fraction of production is wasted during the manufacturing steps.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing

Sentencas: From both economical and environmental point of view, recovery of waste GDC (Gd0.1Ce0.9O3) materials is deemed important.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing

Sentencas: Hence, it is the main purpose of the present study to develop a novel method to recover waste GDC materials and afterwards to produce a new SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) from the recovered materials.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing

Sentencas: The results showed that recovered GDC cell worked as efficient as the fresh materials, revealing the success of the recovery process proposed.
Titulo: A Novel Method for GDC Recovery During Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Manufacturing
